messages.subject: Re: Anger in Children/Niki
messages.msgSnippet: . . . we attract into our life the people and events that ... Oh dear.  What does this tell me, when I seem to attract those who are unhappy and depressed and
messages.messageBody:
. . . we attract into our life the people and events that
> > are lessons for us.>


Oh dear. What does this tell me, when I seem to attract those who
are unhappy and depressed and will always probable be *looking* for
something........


Marianne

messages.subject: Re: Anger in Children/Niki
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/6/2001 1:58:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... lovemary If you wanna make the world a better place, take a look at yourself, and then make a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/6/2001 1:58:33 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
RValvo7626@... writes:


> . So I am reading a new book and had dh read a paragraph last
> night that I thought was poinant. I felt she is reflecting my poor behavior
> from this past month. She is very angry lately
>
> How fortuante for your daughter that you are able to understand and believe
> in this concept. Our children are such great mirrors for us, aren't they?
> And people as well. . . we attract into our life the people and events that
> are lessons for us. I continually remind myself when someone pisses me off
> that it is my lesson. . . why am I feeling anger and what can I do about
>



lovemary
If you wanna make the world a better place, take a look at yourself, and then
make a change.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
